title.narrative: PROCOFSERVICES and P0053 for Poorest Areas Civil Society Programme II

description.narrative: This activity (PROCOFSERVICES and P0053 for Poorest Areas Civil Society Programme II) is a component of Poorest Areas Civil Society Programme II reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £28,203,641. This component benefits India, and works in the following sector(s): Decentralisation and support to subnational government, Democratic participation and civil society, Human rights, Women's equality organisations and institutions. , with the following implementing partners: Christian Aid. The start date is 02-04-2007 and the end date is 30-03-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Decentralisation and support to subnational government

description.narrative: Justice, Law and Order - Justice, Law, Order and Security - Justice, Law and Order - immigration
Other General Services - General Public Service - Other General Services - Local Government Administration
Other General Services - General Public Service - Other General Services - support to civil society
Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - Social Affairs - Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - social services (incl youth development and women+ children)
